Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;10 silicon^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Encouraging results! Try the same thing with other materials such as wood, dirt, stone...heck, almost anything really. You'll find all sorts of things if you just give it a try!
With a ^orange;Hand Mill^reset; you can start cutting your teeth on all sorts of new creations. Try getting at least 50 ^orange;Sand^reset; and extracting it to get some ^orange;Silicon^reset;.
